# <a name="saving-messages-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="83ac9-102">Spremanje poruka u Outlook.com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="83ac9-102">Saving messages in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="83ac9-103">Poruke e-pošte ne možete spremiti u Outlook.com, ali ih možete ispisati u PDF koji možete spremiti na PC.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="83ac9-103">You cannot save email messages in Outlook.com, but you can print them to a PDF which you can save on your PC.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="83ac9-104">Uslužni program Microsoft Print To PDF obuhvaćen sustavom Windows 10 omogućuje ispis bilo koje poruke e-pošte izravno u PDF.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="83ac9-104">The Microsoft Print To PDF utility included in Windows 10 allows you to print any email message directly to a PDF.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="83ac9-105">Odaberite poruku koju želite spremiti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="83ac9-105">Select the message you want to save.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="83ac9-106">Odaberite tri točkice</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="83ac9-106">Select the three dots</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="83ac9-107">pri vrhu poruke, a zatim odaberite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="83ac9-107">at the top of the message and then select</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="83ac9-108">**Ispiši**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="83ac9-108">**Print**.</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="83ac9-109">Odaberite **Ispis** ponovno i na padajućem izborniku pisača odaberite **Microsoft Print to PDF**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="83ac9-109">Select **Print** again, and from the printer drop-down menu, select **Microsoft Print to PDF**.</span></span>
4. <span data-ttu-id="83ac9-110">Odaberite **Ispis**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="83ac9-110">Select **Print**.</span></span>
5. <span data-ttu-id="83ac9-111">Unesite naziv datoteke, a zatim odaberite **Spremi**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="83ac9-111">Enter a file name then select **Save**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="83ac9-112">**Napomena:** To se ne preporučuje na zajedničkim ili javnim računalima jer drugi korisnici mogu imati pristup svim PDF-ovima koje spremite na PC i ne brišu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="83ac9-112">**Note:** This is not recommended on shared or public computers as other users could have access to any PDFs you save to the PC and don't delete.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="83ac9-113">Dodatne informacije o ispisu potražite u odjeljku [Ispis poruka e-pošte, privitaka i kalendara u sustavu Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/c835b8e5-b310-4cab-ac15-b6eb95149855?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="83ac9-113">For more information about printing, see [Print email messages, attachments, and calendars in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/c835b8e5-b310-4cab-ac15-b6eb95149855?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
